resources.string: Looks like you have not setup your facial recognition, hit the button below to start.
Looks like you have already setup your facial recognition, try it!
Input your pin to save your Photos. Passwords length cannot be shorter than 8
Password length cannot shorter than 8. Please input valid password.
Error: Can not find the key to decrypt the file. Something is really wrong.
Error: Image files count is not matched with hash count.
Error: The No. %d image is bad.
Error: The image file hash does not match.
Success: The No. %d image hash matched;
Something wrong when taking your photos, please retry.
Need camera and storage permission to proceed.
